articles.description: Follow live radio & text commentary as Wales host Croatia in a Euro 2024 qualifier at the Cardiff City Stadium.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifying: Wales v Croatia - listen & text

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow text updates as Antoine Dupont starts for France against South Africa.
articles.title: World Cup quarter-final: France & Springboks trade tries - radio & text

articles.description: Follow updates from Norway v Spain, with Scotland able to qualify for Euro 2024 depending on the outcome of the match
articles.title: Norway v Spain: Scotland set for Euro 2024 if hosts fail to win

articles.description: Owen Farrell's boot takes England to the Rugby World Cup semi-finals with a 30-24 victory against Fiji in Marseille.
articles.title: Farrell's boot sends England into World Cup semis

articles.description: England suffer a major shock at the hands of Afghanistan as a sorry 69-run defeat leaves their World Cup defence in real jeopardy.
articles.title: England stunned by Afghanistan in World Cup defeat

articles.description: Watch highlights as England suffer a shock 69-run defeat to Afghanistan in Delhi at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: England suffer shock defeat by Afghanistan

articles.description: Arsenal score twice in injury time as returning England forward Beth Mead helps the Gunners grab a dramatic win over Aston Villa.
articles.title: Returning Mead helps Arsenal to dramatic win

articles.description: Ireland truly believed that this was their year, which makes Saturday's World Cup quarter-final exit at the hands of the All Blacks all the more devastating for them.
articles.title: 'All Blacks crush Irish belief as Sexton's story ends in pain'

articles.description: Watch as Rashid Khan bowls Mark Wood to seal a historic win for Afghanistan over England by 69 runs at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: 'Afghanistan win!' Khan bowls Wood to humble England

articles.description: Everton maintain their derby dominance over Liverpool at Anfield in the Women's Super League as they win for the third time in a row.
articles.title: Everton beat Liverpool to maintain derby dominance
